channel.title: Making Character File Creating [Rep++]
channel.description:
Hey,
OK, so basically I'm working with the 2D source and it doesn't have a loading screen or anything... It also didn't come up with an area to create a username or password or anything. I was wondering how I could do this. If someone could help me that would be great :)
RuneWings317
